related_questions.question:
Rudi is a junior high school student. He goes to SMP 13    everyday. He goes to school on foot (jalan kaki).
Rudi likes playing gootball and basket ball every week.
He never comes late to scholl. He always respects
(menghormati) and obeys (mematuhi) his parents and
teachers.
29. Who is Rudi?
a. A student
b. A teacher
c. A player
d. A football player

30. Where is he studying? 
a. SMP 12 c. SMP 14
b. SMP 13 d. A football player

31. How does he go to school?
a. By bisycle c. By bus
b. By car d. on foot 

32. Does he like basketball? 
a. Yes, he don't c. Yes, he does
b. Yes, he liket d. Yes, he did
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

29. a. A student

30. b. SMP 3

31. d. On foot

32. c. Yes, he does

Penjelasan:

Semoga membantu..

Jawaban:

29. A. A Student

30. B. SMP 13

31. D. On Foot

32. C. Yes, He Does

Jessie J
When tomorrow comes
I'll be on my own
Feeling frightened of
The things that I don't know
When tomorrow comes Tomorrow comes
Tomorrow comes
And though the road is long
I look up to the sky
And in the dark I found,
I lost hope that I won't fly
And I sing along, I sing along
And I sing along
I got all I need when I got you and I
I look around me, and see a sweet life
I'm stuck in the dark but you're my
flashlight
You're getting me, getting me
through the night
Kick start my heart when you shine it in
my eyes
Can't lie, it's a sweet life
I'm stuck in the dark but
you're my flashlight
You're getting me, getting me
through the night
'Cause you're my flashlight (flashlight)
You're my flashlight (flashlight)
You're my flash
42. What is the song about?
A. The singer's new flashlight.
B. The singer's day after tomorrow.
C. The singer's dark side.
D. The singer's special one.
43. How does the writer feel about tomorrow?
A. Happy
B. Sad
C. Scared
D. Stuck
44. Why does the singer sing this song?
A. To show her feeling about tomorrow
B. To help people overcome their problem
C To ask for help because she is always frightened
D. To express her gratitude to have that someone by her side​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

42. A

43. C

44. A/D

Penjelasan:

menurutku itu,tapi kalau mau yang lain gapapa

Jawaban:

A) Live

Penjelasan:

Most bears live in northern parts of the world. (Kebanyakan beruang tinggal di bagian utara dari bumi.)

Kalimat tersebut adalah kalimat pemberitahuan sehingga bentuknya menggunakan Simple Present atau menggunakan bentuk V1.

Pada kalimat tersebut, kata kerja didahului oleh subjek berjumlah majemuk(lebih dari satu) yang ditandai adanya huruf S di belakang kata Bear. Artinya, ada lebih dari satu beruang. Karena terdapat huruf S pada subjek maka kata kerja yang akan diisi tidak memerlukan huruf S.

Contoh:

Cats eat food.

Cat eats food.

V1 V2 Ving

Live Lived Living

Sehingga, jawaban yang tepat adalah

A) Live

related_questions.question: Change the sentences into negative and interrogative a. my mother always give mea a present for my birthday b. he knew the answer off the question c. rudi and anto arema playing badminton now

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. - My mother never gives me a present for my birthday?

? Does your mother give you a present for your birthday?

2. - He didn't know the answer of the question

? Did he know the answer of the question?

3. - Rudi and Anto are not playing badminton now

? Are they playing badminton now?

Penjelasan:

hope you find this helpful^•^

related_questions.question:
6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?    a. Is
b. am
c. was
d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now
a. is 
b. Are 
c. Am
d. Be

Pliss bantu Lagi Kakak Besok ujian saya harus di kumpul​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?

a. Is

b. am

c. was

d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now

a. is

b. Are

c. Am

d. Be

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Present Continuous Tense. Nomor 6. karena subjeknya Mary, maka Tobe nya adalah a. is.

Nomor 7. karena subjeknya Susan dan Susanna, maka Tobe nya adalah b. are.

Semoga membantu ya.
